name: Harasho
description:
A typical "the brave saves the world" RPG. Or is it? Maybe, not sure...

Don't want to give any spoilers(AKA I am too lazy to write an informative description) but I hope it is worth your 10 minutes or however long it took you to finish this game + over 9000 hours or how ever long you spent laughing non-stop (probably won't be that long, if at all. You get the point :>).

Controls:
Move your character with the arrow keys.
Use the Enter key to make choices.
Use "Esc" to save or go back to main menu.

This game is powered by RPG Maker VX Ace.
Most materials are provided by RMVX as well.
Main menu BGM: March of the Spoons by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com). Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

Everything else: Haotian Shen

Enjoy!
